name: spdk-dashboard
description: Demo project for building a Bootstrap powered site via npm.
author: mdo

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss -o assets/css/
scripts.prepare-dist: rm -rf dist && copyfiles -a assets/**/* index.html favicon.ico dist && cat index.html | html-inline -o dist/index.html -b dist && html-minifier --input-dir dist  --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.test: npm run css-lint && npm run css
